Name: Unryū (雲龍)
Range: 8,000 nmi (15,000 km; 9,200 mi) at 18 knots (33 km/h; 21 mph)
processing systems:
2 × Type 2, Mark 2, Model 1 air search radars

1 × Type 93 sonar
2 × Type 0 hydrophones
Armament:
6 × twin 12.7 cm (5 in) Type 89 AA guns
16 × triple, 3 × single 25 mm (1 in) Type 96 AA guns
